subject: Baseball
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: In “Long Shot,” Mike Piazza, the former Mets catcher, admits that he used androstenedione before baseball banned it, but says he did not rely on steroids.
snippet: In “Long Shot,” Mike Piazza, the former Mets catcher, admits that he used androstenedione before baseball banned it, but says he did not rely on steroids.
